price: Nuko tumurokorana n’abari kumwe na we mu nkuge yuzuye (ibiremwa bitandukanye yashyizemo).
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
